name: node-secure-password
description: A simple library for correctly storing and handling passwords on the server in a secure manner
author: Lukas Kuehnert / treylon

scripts.prepare-publish: npm run lint && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.publish-patch: npm run prepare-publish && npm version patch && npm publish && git push origin master
scripts.publish-minor: npm run prepare-publish && npm version minor && npm publish && git push origin master
scripts.publish-major: npm run prepare-publish && npm version major && npm publish && git push origin master
scripts.develop: concurrently "npm run build:watch" "npm run test:watch" "nodemon dist/lib/main.js"
